original_text: “‘In the first month on the fourteenth day you are to observe the Passover, a festival lasting seven days, during which you shall eat bread made without yeast.
korean_text: 첫째 달 열나흗날에는 유월절을 칠 일 동안 명절로 지키며 누룩 없는 떡을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: you are to observe the Passover
during which you shall eat bread made without yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기간 동안 너희는 누룩 없는 떡을 먹어야 하느니라
